title: Easy salmon loaf
ingredients: ['1 (418g) tin salmon, drained and flaked', '100g Doriano Italian crackers, crushed', '1 egg, slightly beaten', '1/2 green pepper, diced', '1/2 small onion, diced', '4 tablespoons milk', '1/2 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 dash hot pepper sauce (optional)', 'black pepper to taste']
